Header.title: CoalTracker
Header.paragraph: The best platform to track coal smuggling

About.paragraph: CoalTracker is a platform where every importer/exporter can keep a track of all the events starting from coal production, import, export, verification. Only the verified imported coal will be a legal tender in country. This will almost stop smuggling of coal during this global coal crisis.
Why: Decrease smuggling during this global coal crisis
Why2: No legal tender to unverified Coal
Catching smuggler and banning license of companies
